Text: King: Hello fellow, I need your help to escape this prison. Do you need more information?

Responses.Text: You: Yes, I need some information.
Responses.NextNodeText: King: Sure, what do you want to know?

Text: King: Sure, what do you want to know?

Responses.Text: You: What do I need to do?
Responses.NextNodeText: King: You have to find the key to open the door. They are both yellow, so you can't miss them.
King: I was imprisoned here for a crime I didn't commit. I need to escape to prove my innocence.

Text: King: I was imprisoned here for a crime I didn't commit. I need to escape to prove my innocence.

Responses.Text: You: Oh, how terrible! I will help you!
Responses.NextNodeText: King: Do you need some more information?

Responses.Text: You: Okay, thanks for the information.

Text: King: You have to find the key to open the door. They are both yellow, so you can't miss them.

Responses.Text: You: I have some more questions.
Responses.NextNodeText: King: Do you need some more information?

Responses.Text: You: Thanks you for the information!
